attributes.action: Simply call an election as we have no confidence in your or the cabinets abilites to deal with issues affecting us.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: you may be "listening" but are not doing anything to make our lives any easier, taxing us into the ground is not the best strategy to win an election

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
